body.directions: Listen to the audio, and then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Which of the following will you most likely find as part of the item indicated by the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 车库 chēkù
options: Audio for 春天 chūntiān
Audio for 学校 xuéxiào
Audio for 星期 xīngqī
body.correct: Excellently done! 房子 fángzi means “house.” Of the four choices, 车库 chēkù (garage) is most likely a part of a house.
body.incorrect: Very close. Listen to the word to identify its meaning. Then review the choices to see which one can reasonably be part of it.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can be completed with the word in the audio?
body.answer: 我的公寓在三_____。Wǒde gōnyù zài sān_____.
options: 他_____四有体育课。Tā _____ sìyǒu tǐyùkè.
她家有五_____人。Tā jiā yǒu wǔ _____rén.
今天是八月四_____。Jīntiān shì bā yuè sì _____.
body.correct: Fantastic job! 楼 lóu means “floor/story/building,” and you can use it to complete the sentence “我的公寓在三楼。Wǒde gōnyù zài sān lóu. (My apartment is on the third floor.)“
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audio again to identify this word’s meaning. Then review all the incomplete sentences in the choices to see which one this word fits the best for both meaning and structure.

body.quiz: Which of the following furniture items can most likely be found at the location indicated by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Very nice job! The word 院子 yuànzi means “yard.” We can most likely find a picnic table there, maybe for a family dinner outdoors on a nice summer evening.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the word in the audio again to identify its meaning. Then review the items in the choices to see which one can be most reasonably seen at the location.

body.quiz: Which of the following words can the word in the audio best be associated with?
body.correct: Excellent job! The word 阳台 yángtái means “balcony.” It can best be associated with 公寓 gōngyù (apartment), which usually have balconies.
body.incorrect: Oops…Listen to the word in the audio again to identify its meaning. Then review the words in the choices to see which one you can associate the word with.
